meanings.definition: The act of consuming food or drink quickly.
meanings.sent1: During lunchtime, the skoling of the cookies was impressive.
meanings.sent2: She finished her meal with a skoling that left everyone amazed.
meanings.sent3: The skoling of the ice cream made everyone laugh as it melted too fast.
meanings.sent4: His skoling of the pizza was like a whirlwind, leaving no slice untouched.
meanings.sent5: The skoling of the popcorn was so rapid, it sounded like a drumroll.

meanings.definition: A person who consumes food or drink quickly.
meanings.sent1: The skoling at the party finished all the snacks in record time.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the office skoling for her speedy lunch breaks.
meanings.sent3: The skoling at the buffet was like a hungry bear on a mission.
meanings.sent4: He was a skoling when it came to desserts, always the first to finish.
meanings.sent5: The little skoling devoured his meal so fast, it was as if he had wings.
